divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home one night (at about 2AM) in January, 1974, southbound on the 405 Fwy on the Sepulveda Pass as it approaches the Westwood area. It was a clear night, and I noticed a light hovering in the sky over Westwood. I thought it odd that a helicopter (which I believed it was) would be up so high, and at this hour. I watched it for a minute or so, and then, it shot across the sky toward the downtown LA area. It took only 1-2 seconds to travel the approximately 15 mile distance and then hovered over the downtown LA area. I was amazed at how quickly it traveled that distance, and knew it couldn't be a helicopter. After about 10 seconds, the light went straight up and disappeared into the sky. At that point, I was certain that I had seen a UFO.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Culver City
There were no other sightings in Culver City on or around December 31st 1973
Summary: A hovering light that traveled over LA in a split second, then shot straight up.
